org.barghos.core.api.color

Interface ILDRColor3R

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IColor3R, ITup3fR, ITupfR
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILDRColor4R
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LDRColor3, LDRColor4, PHDRColor3, PHDRColor4, PLDRColor3, PLDRColor4

    public interface ILDRColor3R
extends IColor3R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only LDR-RGB-Colors.
